plot: Host Richard Alexander visits a huge number of UK nightclubs, speaking to clubbers of all ilks & ages, in an amusing and strangely erotic montage of club-based action.
plot_en: Host Richard Alexander visits a huge number of UK nightclubs, speaking to clubbers of all ilks & ages, in an amusing and strangely erotic montage of club-based action.
plot_es: Host Richard Alexander visits a huge number of UK nightclubs, speaking to clubbers of all ilks & ages, in an amusing and strangely erotic montage of club-based action.
title: UK Uncovered
